abstract: Virginia Gov Terry McAuliffe orders investigation of incident in which Alcoholic Beverage Control agents injured student they were arresting outside Charlottesville bar, leading to accusations of racism.
lead_paragraph: An arrest that left a University of Virginia student bloodied and shouting allegations of racism has prompted some lawmakers to question whether state liquor control agents should have arrest power.

headline.main: Virginia: Arrest Powers for Alcohol Agents Questioned
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Arrest Powers for Alcohol Agents Questioned

snippet: An arrest that left a University of Virginia student bloodied and shouting allegations of racism has prompted some lawmakers to question whether state liquor control agents should have arrest power.
